creator: Curande Apps
descriptionHtml:
You can read LINE not only messages but also photos and stickers as Unread.

■Available function
・You can read messages keeping as unread.
・Sticker can also be seen keeping as unread.
・Photo can also be seen keeping as unread.
・All talks will b displayed separately for each friend
・The icon of group talk is also obvious!

■How to use
1. Launch the app
2. Enable "Access to Notification" according to the dialog
3. Check if the notification settings are enabled in LINE
4. When you receive a LINE notification, open this app to check

■Recommended for like this
・Want to read the message keeping unread.
・Want to read the LINE without reading it, it will forget your reply if you read it
・Want to know what sticker or photo was sent
・Want to see the contents of the message for which sending was canceled
・Android users who are lamenting that "iPhone has 3D Touch"

■Notes
・This app does not recommend unread through. Please use it to confirm the content without temporarily reading already.
・This app only records the messages of the acquired chat inside the device, and does not send the messages to the outside.
・This app records the received message by acquiring the content displayed in the notification area. Therefore, please be aware that you can not record messages that have not been set to display notifications or messages that have not been displayed.
・Need to grant access to storage for viewing photos.
・If you can not get a message even though the settings are enabled, please try restarting your device.
・Some devices have a function that automatically terminates the app, so it may be necessary to add this app to the list of applications that do not terminate automatically.
・"LINE" is a trademark or registered trademark of LINE Corporation.
descriptionShort: You can read LINE not only messages but also photos and stickers as unread.

title: Peep Reader - No Last Seen

creator: Curande Apps
descriptionHtml:
You can see LINE not only messages but also photos and stickers as Unread.

■Available function
・You can see messages keeping as unread.
・Sticker can also be seen keeping as unread.
・Photo can also be seen keeping as unread.
・All talks will b displayed separately for each friend

■How to use
1. Launch the app
2. Enable "Access to Notification" according to the dialog
3. Check if the notification settings are enabled in LINE
4. When you receive a LINE notification, open this app to check

■Recommended for like this
・Want to read the message keeping unread.
・Want to read the LINE without reading it, it will forget your reply if you read it
・Want to know what sticker or photo was sent
・Want to see the contents of the message for which sending was canceled
・Android users who are lamenting that "iPhone has 3D Touch"

■Notes
・This app does not recommend unread through. Please use it to confirm the content without temporarily reading already.
・This app only records the messages of the acquired chat inside the device, and does not send the messages to the outside.
・This app records the received message by acquiring the content displayed in the notification area. Therefore, please be aware that you can not record messages that have not been set to display notifications or messages that have not been displayed.
・Need to grant access to storage for viewing photos.
・If you can not get a message even though the settings are enabled, please try restarting your device.
・Some devices have a function that automatically terminates the app, so it may be necessary to add this app to the list of applications that do not terminate automatically.
・"LINE" is a trademark or registered trademark of LINE Corporation.
descriptionShort: You can see LINE not only messages but also photos and stickers as unread.

・This app only records the messages of the acquired chat inside the device, and does not send the messages to the outside.
・This app records the received message by acquiring the content displayed in the notification area. Therefore, please be aware that you can not record messages that have not been set to display notifications or messages that have not been displayed.
・Need to grant access to storage for viewing photos.
・If you can not get a message even though the settings are enabled, please try restarting your device.
・Some devices have a function that automatically terminates the app, so it may be necessary to add this app to the list of applications that do not terminate automatically.
・"LINE" is a trademark or registered trademark of LINE Corporation.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
■4.0
For a long time, it was not possible to display photos on Android 11 or later due to OS limitations, but thanks to the efforts of our development team, we have developed a β version of the function to display photos on Android 11 or later 🎉

This feature will be provided first as one of the benefits of the premium plan 👑
There is also a 7-day trial period (free if you cancel during the trial period).
